title: Receiving emails
content:
After scanning documents from Epson printer and using the send-to email function I am not receiving the email with attachment. I have also tried switching from Epson WiFi back to home WIFI and I still don't receive them

I have also tried scanning from a HP printer and sending to my email but have not received it
creator: maureenleather53

title: Can not create Primary Password
content: I am trying to create a Primary Password but getting message: "Unable to change Primary Password" Using Thunderbird Version 128.4.1esr | Released November 4, 2024 under Windows 11.
creator: yuri.polyakov

title: not able to receive or send my emails
content: I have contacted my Internet provider and they are unable to get my thunderbird to work can you help me get it working I have it installed on an old computer and it works fine this is a new computer I have AVG and a AVG VPN if this helps we went through all the POP and smtp setting but it still wont work, and I get an error message attachment of Screen shot thank Jenny
creator: jenjenh706

title: Unable to send email using my Thunderbird account
content: I am unable to send emails. My internet provider tells me that it is Thunderbird. I receive a send message error when trying to send and something about the outgoing server.

title: Getting message Platform 115.16.1 not compatible with 115.15.0 - wont open emails
content: Cant open emails message 115,16.1 not compatible with 115.15.0
creator: noladavey70

title: How to turn the Spam filter off
content:
I would like to turn the Thunderbird Spam Filter totally off. It marks legit mails with *** Spam *** and is just annoying.

I followed all instructions in: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-and-junk-spam-messages

I unchecked 'Enable adaptive junk mail controls for this account' in all accounts.

AND STILL: Why is the junk filter active?

I would like to raise a bug report for this.

Thunderbird: 128.4.1esr
creator: firefox2949

title: Pasting a Table from a Word document
content: I used to be able to copy a Table from a Word document and past it into a Thunderbird email and maintain the formatting. Between 1 Nov and 2 Nov I can no longer do this. When I copy and paste the formatting is lost. Can you help please? Thank you.
creator: prisaacson

title: Caratteri non richiesti
content: Succede con "nuovo messaggio" o " rispondi ". Viene visualizzato e inviato questo testo non richiesto. Come faccio ad eliminare questo errore?
creator: giancarlo.biasi

title: non riesco ad aprire amazon i miei ordini  in italiano
content: ripristinare la lingua italiana e farmi aprire i miei ordini in amazon
creator: nardcatti45

title: Account retrieval problem
content:
Up to version 132b1, account retrieval worked. Since Version 132b2 (b3, b4, b5, b6, 133b1) following fault:

The setting is ‘Only download header data when starting TB’

Since 132b2 the following message and click link is missing: "Download the rest of the message"
creator: ischkrischplaque

title: ImportExportTools NG - Esporta in PDF e scarica allegati
content:
Salve a tutti,

l'obbiettivo che vorrei raggiungere è quello di esportare (stampare) in PDF la mail, e scaricare tutti gli allegati, ancora meglio se contestualmente si potrebbe creare una cartella con lo stesso nome del PDF o eventualmente con altri criteri.

Tramite questa estensione molto utile è possibile configurare alcuni aspetti per le esportazioni, ma non è chiaro dove impostare le specifiche caratteristiche per i PDF.

Grazie tante a chi vorrà aiutarmi o indicarmi manuali/guide
creator: gianvito.pa

title: address book synchronization between TB android mobile and TB windows PC
content:
The address book of TB Android beta does not seem to synchronize with my address book in TB Windows.

how can this by achieved?
creator: robgru

title: Thunderbird 128: Message body color
content:
Dear all, Regardless of the theme in Thunderbird I choose, whenever I open a message the background color of the messages is light yellow, what is quite awful and often prevents some message from been read because of the lack of contrast.

I can't find a way to change that. Is there a way to change that, for instance by editing the contents of the XPI of the theme I use?

What should be the CSS code used for that? 

 thanks a ton for you attention!, 
   best
creator: morlop

title: Posta non funzionante
content: Buongiorno, abbiamo un account Thunderbird per il nostro negozio che dal giorno 28/10/2024 non scarica più i nuovi messaggi. Mi potreste aiutare?
creator: PIANODISORRENTO

title: Por que do nada aparece e-mail antigo na caixa de entrada?
content: Gostaria de entender o motivo de alguns e-mails de dias ou meses anteriores aparecerem do nada na caixa de entrada do Thunderbird. Alguns clientes nos enviam e-mail e o mesmo só aparece na caixa de entrada dias depois, às vezes passa de duas semanas. Poderiam me ajudar?
creator: jessica.carvalho

title: font size
content: When the email window comes up the text is giant; even when I reducde it to Tiny the size is still too large; it used to be small enough; what has changed?
creator: KeithPaton

title: Opstarten met wachtwoord
content: Beste, Sinds vandaag moet ik telkens mijn hoofdwachtwoord invullen als ik mijn mailbox of Mozilla firefox wil opstarten. Hoe kan ik dit probleem oplossen zodanig dat ik mijn wachtwoord niet meer moet invullen als ik mijn mailbox wil bekijken. Vriendelijk bedankt om mij te helpen. Frans

title: "Send" control does not show up for sending emails.
content: Solve the problem
creator: dereksreed88

title: Sicherheit bei Spendenüberweisung
content:
Guten Tag, ich habe soeben eine einmalige Spende überwiesen. Wahrscheinlich hat die Überweisung per Kreditkare funktioniert. Dabei wunderte mich, dass ich, obwohl ich bei meiner Bank die 2-Faktor-Authentifizierung aktiviert habe, meine Banking-Sicherheit-App keine Bestätigung verlangte. Bei andern Überweisungen auf diversen Webseiten funktionierte das stets. Unterstützt Thunderbird Mozilla die 2-Faktor-Identifizierung nicht? Das wäre schade. Und ich habe keine Gefühl dabei.

Mit freundlichem Gruß Michael Mintel
creator: mintmich

title: Email nas pastas de arquivo ou enviadas perdem o seu conteúdo
content: Vários emails que tenho nas pastas de arquivamento ao clicar para ver seu conteúdo não exibem este ou exibem um conteúdo codificado, não consigo ver estas mensagens anteriores, cfe exemplos
creator: danielpohren

title: Problems with connection to SMTP server since upgrade to Thunderbird 128.4
content:
I have Thunderbird connected to a number of providers including hotmail and OVH, all configured for IMAP. OS = Linux Mint

Everything was working fine until I installed the upgrade to 128.4 offered by the Linux Mint update manager.

Since then it takes a very long time to even send a simple email with CPU usage going up to or even over 100% (multi-cores). Even in normal usage with nothing happening Thunderbird is using 25% of the CPU.

The sending process often times out giving a message that says the connection was lost to the SMTP server.
creator: richard391

title: non riesco ad inviare mail compare messaggio di errore
content: Buon giorno, non riesco ad inviare mail compare messaggio di errore recipient address rejected, ho già inviato mail a questo utente inoltre non manda nemmeno ad altri .... AIUTO!
creator: info12103

title: In Thunderbird filter ongedaan maken
content: In mijn Inbox (op mijn Apple i-Mac) heb ik zojuist de berichten gefilterd op "Ongelezen", met het doel om de oudste ongelezen berichten te verwijderen. Nu wil ik weer alle berichten in mijn Inbox zien staan, maar het lukt mij niet het filter weer ongedaan te maken.

title: posta in uscita
content: Non riesco ad inviare mail mi da errore
creator: info12103

title: export/import of e-mail failed
content: This is the first time since 10 years that I need help with Thunderbird. I got a new computer and downloaded and installed Thunderbird 128.4.1esr (64-Bit). Then I tried to transfer my e-mail files from my old computer (Thunderbird 128.4.0esr) by the export function using the profile directory function, got a directory named u5n188z6.default (the file is somewhere about 35 GB) . I also could start the import function on the new computer (import from profle "default") and the files were imported to the new local directory posion. However, nothing could be seen within the Thunderbird home page. Could you, please, provide help with this problem? Greetings from Vienna, Winfried Scheirer
creator: winfried.scheirer

title: correo no se vincula con Thunderbird, es decir no se establece Thunderbird como cliente de correo predeterminado.
content: cuando le doy a "seleccionar la aplicacion para abrir archivo .EML" me sale "program files (x86)\ mozilla thunderbird\thunderbird.exe" aun cuando en aplicaciones predeterminadas, si está establecido eml como Thunderbird document - versión instalada del thunderbird es 128 - SO windows 11
creator: asuc11

title: Delete button location moves when selecting group of emails to delete
content:
It is annoying that the message Delete button in the Inbox is not in a fixed position. It moves when one selects a set of emails to delete and fewer selection buttons appear. When in a hurry, I have hit Archive instead of Delete because the location moves, wasting my time to redo what I wanted.

Please FIX the location of the Delete button so it stays in one place across functionality in the Inbox--a UX improvement!
creator: eclaunch

title: Blank emails
content: When I look at any email it is blank. Furthermore, when I moved three emails I lost them completely. This has only just happened. Is it because of an update? what do I do?
creator: david1102

title: latency when deleting a message
content:
Hello, In Thunderbird... Since a recent update (perhaps within the past month), when I delete an email, it takes some time and goes to "not responding" briefly while it waits. This also sometimes seems to happen when sending. But it does NOT happen when receiving messages, so I am doubtful that it is anti-virus related (using only Windows Defender, no 3rd party anti-spam or anti-virus.)

This never happened before the update. Currently using 128.4.1esr (32-bit), but that update was just this morning and it was happening prior to that.

Any thoughts?

Thanks. Scott
creator: shochberg

title: Turvallinen lähettäjä
content: Missä on se kohta, minne turvallisten lähettäjien osoitteet lisätään, siis sallittujen?
creator: heikki5

title: Search
content: Suddenly I do not get any result when seaching allthough I know there are a person with thw name or a topic. I have used Thunderbird for a long time and very often used the search facility. But not now :-(
creator: bent.kobke

title: ‘I have gmail as my default email client with thunderbird and am unable to add my att.net account to Thunderbird although Thunderbird acknowledges the configuration is found in Mozilla ISP database’ for ‘Thunderbird’
content: ‘I have gmail as my default email client with Thunderbird and am unable to add my att.net account to Thunderbird. Thunderbird acknowledges a green message that the configuration is found in Mozilla ISP database for Thunderbird. When I click on "done" I get the yellow warning "Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username or password". "Configuration was automatic setup as: incoming at POP 3 inbound att.net and outgoing SMTP outbound att.net. I have tried manual configuration and checked password to no avail. My att user ID has not changed in 20+ years and has always been my email address at att.net. I would like to add that I had a att.net account with Thunderbird until I did a Thunderbird recommended upgrade and then lost the att account including all my emails. Is there any way to recover this account?
creator: Bob9754

title: How do you get rid of threads????
content:
How do you get rid of threads???? All the solutions I've seen are to complex for me.

I've been using Mozilla for at least a decade now, but this feature is driving me crazy. I hope I can find an easy solution, otherwise..... can someone recommend a different email server?

Thanks! Mark
creator: markralph1

title: Ricerca salvata
content:
Buonasera a tutti.

Ho creato una ricerca salvata che mi mostra le email arrivate nelle ultime ventiquattr'ore in un sottoinsieme di cartelle dei miei tre account (circa una trentina di cartelle su circa 100).

Vorrei adesso replicare questa ricerca, nelle stesse cartelle, ma per le email arrivate negli ultimi sette giorni.

C'è modo di copiare le ricerca salvata in modo che possa poi semplicemente modificare, nella copia, il numero di giorni da considerare?

Spero di essere stato chiaro e grazie a tutti
creator: v.dmmt

title: Thunderbird starts up white screen and then goes to crash report.
content: unable to use Thunderbird, try to open program and all I get is a white screen for 2-4 seconds, then a crash report pops up. Unable to get any further. Have uninstalled, cleared cache, reboot, then reinstall. Help appreciated. Win 10. Kevin
creator: mckinnk

title: Thunderbird 128.4.0esr (64-bit) Lightning how to change the background of today on month view
content: I have recently updated Thunderbird and Lightning and now lost being able to use the Calendar Tweaks add-on. I want to change the background colour for the today entry on the month view which used to be done by that add-on. I want to be able to set this and other items to my own specific colours. How do I achieve this?
creator: stuart39

title: Thunderbird not responding and crashing after update to 128.3.3
content:
I recently had a Thunderbird update to version 128.3.3. Since then I have very serious issues with it. When I start it, it does not respond for a long time (it is looking for something?), and then it gives the crash report, as shown below. I noticed that Version 115.10.1.0 is installed in Program Files (x86), but it no longer works. When I try to open it it wants me to set up a new profile. Version 128.3.3 is installed in Program Files (and this one does not work). Yesterday, I could get version 128.3.3 to work after running another update on it. However, after getting out of it, it will no longer work, even if I try to update it. Do you have a suggestion on how I can restore Thunderbird to work? Thank you.

creator: tedk

title: How to Re-Sync Gmail Account on TB with Server?
content:
If I delete a Gmail account in TB and create it anew, is there any chance that will mess anything up on the server?

My problem is that every so often TB downloads all the headers in my Inbox, sometimes showing more headers than are in the Inbox. The same thing happens when I do a Repair Folder on Inbox.

I believe it got this way when I did copies in both TB and Gmail, and some messages got multiple Gmail labels. I went into the Gmail account and fixed all those messages, so now all messages on the server have at most one label. But the weird downloads are still happening.

Does it make sense to try deleting the account in TB and putting it back anew?

And is there a way to save and reinstall the account's filters in TB?
creator: Toolworker

title: certificate expired thunderbird
content: i get message that thunderbird certificate is expired. how do i fix this?
creator: jlroch

title: Email Passwords
content:
I have used Thunderbird for a long time and it's the best. However, I made a donation and all fell apart. Then I made another donation and still nothing works. Then I made another donation and it got worse. I am continually being asked for my password and when I type it in, it says that the password "failed". My password was changed by Comcast so I changed Thunderbird settings to the new password and it's not working at all. I haven't had email now for about 3 months. I've gone to Comcast and they say that all is well on their end. Could my settings be off on Thunderbird. I'm 83-years old and I really need help. My personal email address is SillySam@comcast.net. I also have LatonHigh@comcast.net used for historical research. Please help me.

Linda Collison van der Veur Clovis, California
creator: sillysam

title: PROBLEME ENVOI DE MAILS
content: Bonjour, J'ai 3 comptes de messageries gérés sur Thunderbird. Sur l'un des trois (jeanmarie.doree@outlook.fr), je reçois bien des messages mais il m'est impossible d'en envoyer... alors que sur les deux autres tout fonctionne normalement. J'ai supprimé ce compte et je l'ai réinstallé mais le problème est toujours là (voir pièce jointe). Merci d'avance pour votre aide ! Cordialement, JM Dorée

title: Thunderbird 128.4.1esr crashing @ EMPTY: no frame data available; EmptyMinidump (win10)
content:
Hi,

Thunderbird used to work fine for me, but since today I cannot start it anymore. It opens a blank window and freezes. I tried some basic stuff like restarting my PC, uninstalling and reinstalling Thunderbird and starting it with all add-ons disabled. While searching for similar errors I found some solutions that included deleting the parent.lock file from the profiles folder and deleting the windows cache in appdata/local/thunderbird/profiles, which also did not solve the issue for me. Any ideas?

The crash ID is: bp-6669759c-9a50-464b-a8cb-5126c0241105

title: Incoming emails in Trash Folder
content: I have been using Thunderbird for several years without problems but in the last several days all incoming emails are directed to the Trash folder. When I try to Move them back int the Inbox hey immediately jump back into the Trash folder. Does somebody have an idea or two that could solve my problem please? Hoping Terry O
creator: 2shea

title: unable to send a msg err
content:
unable to send msg with err

An error occurred while sending mail: Outgoing server (SMTP) error. The server responded: resomta-h2p-554995.sys.comcast.net resomta-h2p-554995.sys.comcast.net Excessive failed authentication, ESMTP server temporarily not available
creator: kammorey

title: NEW T-BIRD VERSIONS NOT MARKING MESSAGES AS READ WHEN OPENED
content:
Hi! None of the online comments, in either T-Bird Help, nor web searches, help with this problem, because the Settings interfaces are totally different from what are described in Help or in web searches.

My new T-Bird update as of today, but also the preceding version, does not mark messages as read. Even after I have read a message it continues to be displayed as bold face after I move on to another.

My only option is to left-click on the message, select MARK> on the drop-down, and select MARK AS READ.

Nowhere in the setup or SETTINGS sections do I find the option:

___ Mark all opened messages as read

or something like that ... which is what I need. Am I missing something? or is this a Bug?

Many thanks for your reply ...

tgk
creator: expwys

title: SMTP Authentication
content: I need an email to use in another software that can send through SMTP. Gmail and Outlook are both no longer using SMTP. How do I set this up to work? The required information in the other software is SMTP Mail Server and port.
creator: arbogast.rush

title: doubling account and switching both from pop to imap
content:
Hej :) So I hope I can write my message understandably... :D

We use thunderbird on linux and so far I have my kids account integrated in my thunderbird with a pop-server. I would like to copy the existing account onto their own computer and then switch the server for both to imap. So in the end they and I have access to old emails (received until now with a pop server) and also newly incoming ones with the imap server.

Is this possible or would I lose the emails/screw up the server or the account or sth? And could you outline what I would need to do to get the setup I want?

Thank you so much for your help! Irina
creator: irina.kaufmann

title: Using Thunderbird - can I DELETE an E-Mail account?
content: Is it possible to delete a Thunderbird E-Mail account? By that I mean delete all E-Mails received or sent, delete the E-Mail entirely and then set up the account, same as it ever was, but keeping NONE of the past history, previous E-Mails, etc?
creator: wolf-meister
